_header: Yet tell will I a tale here
Subjects: Pelagia, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Pelagia, in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
[ȝ]ete tel wil I a tale hereþat men suld haf ȝarning
                    to here…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…& of þis lyfe þat we twynebut det schame &
                    dedly syne
CULGg26.Note:
Preceding text, 6857,
                    ends with false start to this one

Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth

             Scottish Text Society
